mapper.select: select s.SIG_ID,s.SIG_Code,s.SIG_Name,s.SIG_Unit,s.SIG_Type,s.SIG_FAC_ID,s.SIG_Address,s.SIG_AddressNum,s.SIG_DataType,f.FAC_Name,d.DSIG_Value,d.DSIG_DateTime as dsigDateTime from C_Signal s left join C_Facility f on f.FAC_Code = s.SIG_FAC_ID left join C_DSignal d on d.DSIG_SIG_Code = s.SIG_Code where d.schoolId = #{schoolId} order by d.DSIG_DateTime desc
